channel.title: Change max skill
channel.description: Ok how do i change max stat and combat i have tried it but it seems not to work...also how to i do it like when i type ::boostmaster it will make my skill to the max??...because i have ::boostmaster and when i type it...my stat changes to 99 but i want it to be like 150 or something like that with combat 150 or something or 255 please help

item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:

I know thats the point like whats the exp for like stat 300 or stat 200 or somethign like that

Read full topic

item.title: Change max skill
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

you need to change the exp added for boostmaster. Open client.java. Search for boostmaster. Type the exp equivalent to level 255

Read full topic
